## Load packages
```{r eval=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(assertr)
```


## Import data

```{r warning=FALSE}
H1B18<-read.csv(unzip("data/h1b18.csv.zip")) %>% 
  clean_names()
file.remove("h1b18.csv")
```

## data cleaning

**Todo list:**
Filter H1B visa_class
Remove all of missing value
Uppercase -> lowercase
Lubridate all of the date

```{r}
unique(H1B18$visa_class)
```


```{r}
H1B18 <- H1B18 %>% 
  filter(visa_class=="H-1B")


H1B18_test <- H1B18
for(i in 1:ncol(H1B18_test)){
  H1B18_test[i] <- gsub("^$", NA,H1B18_test[i])
}
H1B18_test <- na.omit(H1B18_test)
```


```{r}
H1B18 <- na.omit(H1B18)
```
